class pepper.framework.backend.system.camera.SystemImage(image, bounds)[source]¶

Bases: pepper.framework.abstract.camera.AbstractImage

System Image Container

Since Web Cams generally do not have depth sensors, we set every pixel at a depth of one meter.

Parameters:
image: np.ndarray

RGB Image (height, width, 3) as Numpy Array

bounds: Bounds

Image Bounds (View Space) in Spherical Coordinates (Phi, Theta)
Attributes:

RGB Image (height, width, 3) as Numpy Array

Get time image was captured and received by the application.

get_direction(coordinates) Convert 2D Image Coordinates [x, y] to 2D position in Spherical Coordinates [phi, theta]
